DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this clinical study is to evaluate the influence of the Great autohemotherapy with oxygen-ozone (hyperbaric ozone therapy ) to describe the cardiovascular system in patients with resistant hypertension. The primary endpoint is the change in mean blood pressure after 10 treatments . In addition, data are collected on the immune system as well as for food and sleep quality.
DOC.brief_title: Grand Autohemo-Therapy With Oxygen-ozone on Patients With Hypertonia
